mdRecord.dcterms:title: Les triumphes Petrarcque
Petrarca, Francesco, 1304-1374. Trionfi. French (Middle French)
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Petrarca, Francesco, 1304-1374 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Douglas H. Gordon Collection of French Books (University of Virginia) [original]
La Forge, George de, active 15th century [translator]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Signatures: A-F⁸ G⁴ H-Z⁸ AA⁸ BB⁴ CC-DD⁸. [original]

Colophon: Cy finissent les triumphes de Messire Francoys Petrarcque ... nouuellement redigez de son langaige vulgaire Tascan en nostre diserte langue Francoyse. Et imprimez nouuellement a Paris par Denys Ianot ..., 1539. [original]
Prose translation by Georges de La Forge. [original]

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Binder: Bozerian, jeune. Monogram bookplate of SSB, i.e. Silvain S. Brunschwig. Bookplate of C.N. Radoulesco. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 459. [original]
